```{r selecting IV, creating objects for IV only}

happy <- data %>%
characterize() %>%
  select(V10)

# And the other instead has the assigned numeric value. (Note that some of these values are negative, so one next step here is to do a transformation that allows us to have all positive values to use in analysis?)

happy_numeric <- data %>%
  select(V10)
```
